definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Hermes jumped into the pond with a splash again.
sentences.chinese: 池水再濺，赫爾墨斯又一次跳進池塘。

sentences.english: Immediately after he was born, Hermes was appointed god of thieves at Olympus.
sentences.chinese: 赫爾墨斯一生下來就被任命爲奧林波斯山的賊神。

sentences.english: Then, Hermes, the guardian God of the town, showed up.
sentences.chinese: 後來，赫爾墨斯，這個小鎮的守護神，出現了。

sentences.english: He told neighbors and relatives that she decided to live in California.
sentences.chinese: 赫爾墨斯告訴鄰居和親戚她打算到加利福尼亞定居。

sentences.english: Hermes jumped into the pond with a splash.
sentences.chinese: 池水一濺，赫爾墨斯跳進池塘。

sentences.english: A man carves an idol 1 and takes it to the fair.
sentences.chinese: 有人雕刻了一個赫爾墨斯的木像，拿到市場上去賣。
